location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Macleod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushere [Bushire] to John Wedderburn, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing the accounts (not present) of the Resident in the Persian Gulf up to 30 June 1823. It notes that the Resident has not carried forward the amount due to William Bruce, nor has he included presents supplied by the Civil Paymaster at Bombay. It also states the dates that he considers himself to be entitled to additional salary.
